metadata.title: CVE-2021-30836 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, tvOS 15, watchOS 8, iOS 15 andiPadOS 15. Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may discloserestricted memory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30836` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.33.90-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.33.90-1ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
